title: Nazodelavo Cave
about: Nazodelavo Cave is located in Samegrelo, in the municipality of Chkhorotsku, in the village of Akhuti, on the left bank of the river Zani, 240 meters from sea level. A huge underground river is flowing in the main passage of the cave. This passage itself is erosive. The length of the main tunnel is 4 meters, and the height is 3 meters. It also has, comparatively, narrow and shorter branchings. To sum up, the cave is 600 meters long.
